document_data.name: Ritual of the Dark Flames
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ritual of the Dark Flames''', or '''Ritual of Dark Flames''',
document_data.Activities: While the exact specifications of the ritual were undisclosed, it required the use of a black [[onyx]] gem worth at least 100 [[gp]].
document_data.Outcome:
The Ritual of the Dark Flames allowed a loyal devotee of Cyric to conjure and wield black flames born from [[negative energy]] itself. The use of this supernatural power was etremely taxing on the mind and will of its wielder.

It was regularly performed upon members of the [[Company of the Ebon Spur]], to bolster their prowess on the battlefield.
document_data.History: The ritual was developed some time during or after the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, when Cyric drove himself mad by reading from the ''[[Cyrinishad]]''. It was still being performed regularly as of the {{YearlinkName|1374}}.
